title: Whiskey Cake
instructions: Beat all except nuts 5 mins. Then add nuts. Grease tube pan & pour in batter. Bake @ 350Â° for 55 mins. Cool for 1 hr.
Melt butter & add water & sugar. Boil 5 min; remove from heat; add whiskey.
Pour glaze over cooled cake while still in pan. Wrap tightly in foil & refrigerate.
